explanation: [0-0] On a brown door with intricate patterns, there is a yellow doorknob. A blue cassette tape is attached to the door with yellow tape. On the white label in the middle of the cassette, the word "HELP" is crossed out in red ink, and the word "Candy" is written in red below. In the upper left corner of the screen are the letters "GH'S."

[0-3] Next, a right hand wearing a beige floral dress grabs the doorknob and opens the door. Inside is a little girl with a bun hairstyle, wearing a yellow shirt and teal shorts. She is kneeling on one knee, holding an injured black and white plush toy sheep. Behind her is a playground with swings and a carousel, shrouded in fog. The little girl looks ahead in fear and extends her right hand forward. The toy sheep remains in her arms, its eyes sadly closing and reopening. At the same time, a white speech bubble with a black border appears from the right, with the word "NO" written in black inside, then disappears. The girl's eyes turn completely black, her eyebrows furrow, and then the door slams shut, the right hand disappearing from the right side.

[3-5] The door shakes continuously. Then the right hand reaches out again and opens the door. Inside, on the right, is a medical bed with a person strapped to it, only their legs and right hand visible. The medical cart on the left is covered in blood, and blood-stained white objects are scattered on the floor. A white speech bubble with a black border appears on the right side of the screen with a black question mark inside, then disappears.

[3-5] The door shakes continuously. Then the right hand reaches out again and opens the door. Inside, on the right, is a medical bed with a person strapped to it, only their legs and right hand visible. The medical cart on the left is covered in blood, and blood-stained white objects are scattered on the floor. A white speech bubble with a black border appears on the right side of the screen with a black question mark inside, then disappears.

[5-8] The scene changes again. A spider-like creature appears with slender limbs and a mouth full of sharp teeth. In front of its head are white bubble-shaped decorations of varying sizes, and behind its head are two round head ornaments with alternating black and gray patterns. It holds a scalpel and surgical saw in its hands, shaking its body as it performs surgery on the toy sheep strapped to the medical bed.
